About me

Hello! My name is Braden Townsell and I'm a Software Engineer based in Oklahoma. I have a passion for learning and creating new things. I'm a Full-Stack Software Engineer with a focus on the Back-End. I have experience with C#, JavaScript, Vue, and SQL.

I'm always looking for opportunities to grow as a Software Engineer. If you would like to know more about me or collaborate on a project, please feel free to reach out!
